description.value: You can tap into the magic that runs through your blood. You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Animal Form]{Animal Form} (wolf only, using the statistics for a canine) and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Obscuring Mist]{Obscuring Mist} as 2nd-level divine innate spells. You can cast each of these spells once per day.
